name: June Bug in the Spotlight Theatre
name_original: June Bug in the Spotlight Theatre
description:
Navigate the haunted theatre with the arrow keys.

Press the A Button (keyboard z) to speak or interact.

Press the B Button (keyboard x) to  capture and playback the voices of ghosts via EVP.

Press the Start Button (keyboard enter) to check your progress in the menu. (Not Implemented)

Note, Caps Lock MUST be off (or you'll scare away the ghosts with all your noise)

**Known Bugs**

When you talk to certain ghosts the sprites turn into artifacts all over the screen. If you take a step in any direction the graphics go back to normal. Have fun!
